#define seq_page_flag ( seq,
page,
flag,
has_flags   ) 
Value:
do {                  \
        if (test_bit(PG_##flag, &(page)->flags)) {                  \
                seq_printf(seq, "%s"#flag, has_flags ? "|" : "");       \
                has_flags = 1;                                          \
        }                                                               \
} while(0)
